edu.iit.ir.simpledm.data
Class AttributeValue

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.iit.ir.simpledm.data.AttributeValue
Direct Known Subclasses:
CategoricalAttributeValue, ContinuousAttributeValue
public abstract class AttributeValue
extends java.lang.Object

This is an abstract attribute class that will be the super class of all attributes. All sub-classes will call the constructor for this class and provide their type.
The type of AttributeValue in data package and the type of Attribute in preprocessing package can be different if a user transformed the types on the PreprocessingPanel. That is, the type of Attribute is determined by the header of a data file, while the one in an AttributeValue can be transformed by a user after preprocessing. Therefore, when a model is created and tested, the type in an AttributeValue should be considered regarding to the types of attributes.
